LineageSearchEntity.description: The model for each entity returned by the lineage search query

entity.description: Urn of the entity being returned

restrictedAspects.description:
A list of the the restricted aspects on the entity.
If the key aspect is present, assume ALL aspects should be restricted including the entity's Urn.

extraFields.description: Extra fields from the search document based on what is requested in the search request

paths.description:
Optional list of entities between the source and destination node.
There can be multiple paths from the source to the destination.

path.description: Optional list of entities between the source and destination node

degree.description: Degree of relationship (number of hops to get to entity)

degrees.description: The degrees of separation (number of hops) between the source and this entity

explored.description: Marks an entity as having been explored for as a part of the graph walk

truncatedChildren.description: Indicates this destination node has additional unexplored child relationships

ignoredAsHop.description: Whether this relationship was ignored as a hop while performing the graph walk
